"D-arker Extermination VI":
"You're proving to be rather ambitious as far as
ARKS ops go, so maybe this request is right
up your alley. I want you to destroy any and all
of the extremely large D-arkers you encounter.
You choose where. This shouldn't be impossible
for you, based on your performance so far.
But it's up to you whether or not you want to do it.
No one is forcing you to do anything."

"あんたはそれなりにやる気のある
アークスみたいだから
一つ、この依頼を受けてはみないかい？

場所は問わない。
超大型のダーカーを狙っての殲滅。

あんたの力なら、不可能じゃないはずだ。
やるやらないは任せるけどさ。"
